metadata.name: Project Orchestration & Coordination
metadata.description: Master orchestration workflow for coordinating multiple agents, managing dependencies, and ensuring project milestones are met.

steps.action: Parse project requirements and create task dependency graph
Design high-level architecture and define service boundaries
Load project context, team velocity, and historical patterns
Assign tasks to specialized agents based on capabilities and workload
Set up monitoring for agent progress, blockers, and completion status
Coordinate agent communication via shared memory namespaces
Handle agent failures and blockers with automatic retry strategies
Aggregate agent outputs and ensure milestone completion
Generate project status report with completion metrics

benefits: Intelligent task routing based on agent capabilities and specializations
Parallel execution of independent tasks for faster completion
Automatic dependency management and task sequencing
Real-time progress monitoring with blocker detection
Scalable coordination for large multi-agent projects
